author: eptwts
text:
i've been writing a course on how to use AI to make $$$ without the usual "technical" fluff...

i realized is that 95% of what you need to learn to utilize AI to make money... has NOTHING to do with AI

95% of it is just biz sauce, AI is just used as a tool to speed things up or make things possible

there's a lesson in there that the AI space on X might not be ready for
